website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for anyone who prefers carnauba to synthetic waxes and likes the idea of easy-on, easy-off application; but the results it produces may not live up to other premium waxes on our list.
pros: Car wax has a creamy consistency that makes it easy to apply and remove
Carnauba-based – a traditional wax ingredient that has stood the test of time
Users rave about the results it produces on black cars
cons: Shine tends to fade with several washes, and beading is not noted on all types of finishes
Doesn't produce a high shine on all cars

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome. Removal is easy
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome. Removal is easy. Looks great after application. I was really excited when I saw the initial results, but when it comes to waxes it's all about the longevity for me. Pretty much all polishes and waxes have similar results when you look at a picture someone posts immediately after doing the work, don't go by that. This stuff doesn't last very long and doesn't do a good job of repelling any rain. Maybe it does a good job of protecting against sun but this is looking like it's just lotion for your paint. In my experience, a good wax will keep your car looking fresh long after it's used. This doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Super Shiny and more Protective than expected
customer_reviews.text: Although more of a "show wax", this product is super easy to apply, and just as easy to take off leaving an incredible shine and smooth surface. It had a nice beading effect even one month plus in nasty winter weather, meaning this wax has some good protective qualities to it, even though it isn't marketed as one. If you are going to take the time to care for your car, this is a super easy to use wax.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: The BEST product out there
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is honestly a game-changer! It works good, is insanely easy to use, and as random as it is...it smells amazing haha. Definitely recommend this and pretty much all of their products. I have a white Kia Optima SX and have tried quite a few waxes and washes but honestly nothing has made my car THIS shiny and nice. Top notch product. I'm on my second bottle, and I've also waxed my parents car a few times, and my wife's car a few times. Dark blue car and light blue/purple car. All three colors I've used it on look stunning after. Simply the best hand wax in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.  Ignore the 5 star reviews, this thing is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this thing. Easy to apply and take off, but if it rains your whole car will Ben yellow. Also doesn’t last, and the worst part, as soon as you’re done waxing it attracts dust like no other wax. And I’m using the best microfiber towels crated for anti static. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Porsche

customer_reviews.title: Putting on and taking off is virtually effortless and they all smell amazing. I cannot get over the shine and how ...
customer_reviews.text: Clay Luber, Jet Seal and Butter Wax is a yearly must now. These product are phenomenal and all work really well together. Putting on and taking off is virtually effortless and they all smell amazing. I cannot get over the shine and how easy the car is to keep clean now that its sealed and waxed. Wish I would have had this stuff 20 years ago when I detailed cars! Would have made life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Joele

customer_reviews.title: There is better for less money
customer_reviews.text: The results of this wax was pretty disappointing. It was applied with a Flex Long Throw DA polisher. It goes on easy and comes off easy. Dont get it on trim as getting it off of plastic isn't easy. For the final results, there are easier tech waxs out there that provide better gloss, without the danger of ruining trim. For a caranuba wax it is easy application with average results. For direct comparisson, Collinite 915 Marque D' Elegance Premium SHOW CAR Wax, Surf City Garage Hot Rod Protectant, Ultima Waterless Wash, and Nanoskin Shock and a few others.
customer_reviews.author: Candidcapture

customer_reviews.title: does not last
customer_reviews.text: Used as a first coat, followed by Top Coat. Looked beautiful right after application. 2 weeks later and water no longer beads and is not deflecting any dust or dirt or anything. I expected more out of a highly recommended expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about you, but I hate reading long reviews. Here are the most important things you need to know: 1. Overpriced 2. Very difficult to apply; thick & sticky 3. Laborious to remove 4. Leaves a moderate shine (only pro) 5. Wears off extremely quickly. Like 1 week quickly (and I only hand wash) 6. Water spots stain like crazy I have no idea how this has so many positive reviews. It is actual garbage (it’s in my trash right now).
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a long lasting wax for my Corvette. After a few rains nothing left on car no wax? Doesn’t repel water. I’ve read you have to wax like every other month? I dont think so! Looking for a new wax
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be more of what they advertise. More waxy or oily until it's dry. This product comes out of the bottle in a fluffy chocolate mouse consistency with a fruity odor. That odor morphs into a baby oil smell that is a disgusting smell for a paint wax. Moreover, the product does not leave a glossy shine. It's almost a useless product as far as I'm concerned. There are many far cheaper products I've used that give far better results. The whole "melts into the paint" slogan they use is unfounded and erroneous from what I've experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Blasty

customer_reviews.title: Spreads like soft butter
customer_reviews.text: I contimplated getting this wax for a while, after sifting thru several reviews I decided to give it a try. I am Extremely happy with the way it applies and removing it is a breeze! The Shine is excellent and there's no residue or dust afterwards. The one negative it has is that it actually makes fine surface scratches more noticeable, which gave me a reason to get the DA out and do some paint correction. Bottom line is if you keep your vehicles paint pristine you'll be happy with this wax, if your looking to make some old paint look good you might want a different product or a Cleaner/Wax combo.
customer_reviews.author: rjj

customer_reviews.title: Smells like candy
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a deep and rich finish on my paint. Goes on easy and comes off like butter. Plus it smells like candy. Perfect to put on before a car show, cars and coffee, or for a fun canyon drive. Only compliant is that it doesn’t last too long. Of course it’s not designed to, CG has a lot of products that are meant to last multiple washes and rains storms, this is not one of them and it was not intended to do so. Works great on top of jet seal!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy and Hazy
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE Chemical Guys user. Very disappointed in this product. It was lumpy....and no matter how much I mixed it...still lumpy. Had to use it on a customers car, and was impossible to get off. Left a haze everywhere. Now I have to redo the car which is costing me time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really do much.
customer_reviews.text: This is only good if you want to show your car. For a quick shine (which didn't help me anyway). I have a 2019 Honda SUV. After a rain, it was gone. What a waste of money. Spent several hours putting it on and buffing it on a sunday early morning under a shade. The next day it rained a little, wiping the car off you could tell the wax was gone. Why bother with this. Just use paste wax and be done.
customer_reviews.author: KWC

customer_reviews.title: One Of My Favorite Chemical Guy's Products
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest carnauba wax out there to apply and remove. Just as the name implies, it goes on like butter. One of the great qualities about this product is there is no hazing involved, it is a wipe on and wipe off product. The depth, shine and gloss is amazing for such an easy to apply product. Also, it is worth noting that it has a great smell like the other chemical guys products which is a great bonus when detailing. When combined with a proper paint sealant it provides great protection as well. This is for sure one of my favorite chemical guys products.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: goes on easy, "comes off" easy
customer_reviews.text: When first using this wax you notice the smell. Great! while applying you'll notice how smooth and easy it is to apply. While removing you'll notice how easily it appears to wipe off. I have noticed from the few times i've used this wax now that there is still an uneven residue when using this product. When compared side by side to a different product i noticed this product left me wondering if i had buffed the area enough. Not worth the price or hype. This brand seems to be the premium price range with all their products while only a few are at a premium level quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Butter me up with this one!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. After using several other car waxes, I decided to try this one. Part of the reason for trying this wax was because of the AMAZING results we got from their VRP product made our Honda Element non-metal parts shine like we just bought the card yesterday. The bottom line is that this wax is amazing, and like the other reviews say it is not hard to remove (like most other car waxes) and leaves the most beautiful shine I have EVER seen on a car in over 50 years.
customer_reviews.author: The Bas

customer_reviews.title: removes spray paint!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after seeing a video on youtube. This will remove spray paint from a vehicle! I had some black over spray on a truck and this took it off. Just used a green scrubby bad, applied wax, with light circular motions and off it came. Took awhile but it does work! Don't know about the shine and longevity as I only used it on a small area that I accidentally got black spray paint on.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: To Be Used With A Car Polisher
customer_reviews.text: This product is to be used with a car polisher. Can’t be used alone and wasn’t part of the description.
customer_reviews.author: LusciousLatina

customer_reviews.title: Easy off!
customer_reviews.text: Have a new black porsche. Read the reviews and decided to try it. First thought, smells good. Goes on really easy with blue applicator purchased separately, now the real question how does it come off? I purchased three of the two sided clothes, really liked these my god made life easy. Took one hour and my black porsche looks better today then when it sat on the showroom floor. The bottle is big and was full enough for at least 5 cars. Thank you for a nice wax!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Inbetween wax
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for like a quick shine or to use inbetween true wax (paste) jobs. This won't last long. Smells good and is easy to apply. I don't understand the hype behind it though. Between my Collinite Insulator Liquid wax which shines and lasts way longer and is just as easy to apply and remove, and their paste wax I also use. I ended up just returning this.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dix

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work as described for me using a orbital polisher and by hand.
customer_reviews.text: Does not do what it describes. I tried to use this wet seal but it never looks clean or nice. Swirl marks only. I’ve tried using an orbital polisher and by hand with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not a top-shelf wax....
customer_reviews.text: After I washed the car with clean slate, I applied this wax. I didn't notice the car was any more shiny and it definitely does not have a high gloss finish. I have a Meguiar's deep shine wet wax that I use for car shows and the car looks dripping wet. This butter wax was the same cheap crap you can buy anywhere.... Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I find that this isn't as good as the Meguiar's wax that it replaced. It's much easier to apply and remove but it doesn't really "coat" the paint as well as other waxes I've used. I find that I'm re-applying this every time I wash the car, I will probably use this to coat other outdoor paint finishes just not my car. This was the only Chemical Guys product that didn't wow me and I own lots of their products.
customer_reviews.author: C.Strawn

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS.  NOT JUNK LIKE ALOT OF OTHERS.  A+ FOR RETAIL VERSION
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product. Went on easy and came off easy, just as it states. I buy alot of products to see which one works well, and for retail Chemical guys, is Awesome. I love the results. I also use meguires and i like the results. Buy chemical guys and try it. Their interior cleaner, and and quick detailer are great as well . And worth the price . I detail my car and wifes, and the whole neighborhood says wow. JUST LOOK AT THE SHINE. REFLECTION
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The contents of my bottle after being more than adequately shaken was very watery. I have seen videos where the product appeared to be much thicker (like squeeze Parkay Butter) than the contents in my bottle. I believe this was old stock that was not rotated and/or may have been frozen at one time. It was so watery it was somewhat difficult to apply and remove. The shine is OK but not any better than what I can get from any carnuba wax at the local Walmart. I may try again but only if I have a bottle that has the viscosity of what I have seen on YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R.

customer_reviews.title: This kills Meguiar's!
customer_reviews.text: Did a full detail of my car, and this wax has by far been the closest to the "showroom shine" always advertised. I used an electric orbital waxer to apply and removed by hand with a micro cloth. This took a little bit more effort than other waxes, but it was worth it. Not only could i see myself in my car for the first time, but it did an effective job of repelling annoying tree wax that later fell on my car. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Pain to remove
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly terrible experience... I've sworn by Chemical Guys products in the past and I've heard nothing but good things about this stuff so I finally gave it a try. Hate it. Goes on pretty easy but removal was a PAIN IN THE ASS...maybe I got a bad batch? Not sure what happened but very disappointed with this product. Definitely will NOT buy again.. Not impressed with the results either... Come on chemical guys...you can do better than this..
customer_reviews.author: Zachary K.

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST carnauba wax out there.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a carnauba wax fan, this stuff is a love letter to you. I personally think this is Chemical Guy's BEST product. Everything about this product is just a pleasure. How it goes on, how it comes off, how it smells, how it looks, how it makes the paint feel afterwards is just amazing. I've read that people complain that it doesn't last very long but that doesn't mean much if you know anything about carnauba- you're not in it for the durability. The gloss and depth is unrivaled. Buy it and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: David Wetherbee

customer_reviews.title: Goes on and comes off easily but it DOES NOT LAST MORE THAN A WEEK!
customer_reviews.text: This wax is amongst the most user friendly. It does make the car shine like new. Yet, it doesn’t last more than a week. I bought a gallon of this stuff and it’s been sitting unused after the first two applications. If I’m going to spend the time waxing my car, I’m going to use a product that lasts and outperforms this one. Anyone want a gallon of this junk??? I can’t quite bring myself to just toss it since it was so expensive. Maybe I’ll save it for when I take time off work and have nothing better to do than wax my car every single day with this crap. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Jared - Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: As hard to get off as paste wax.
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok but hard to wipe off. I thought it would be similar to liquid wax but it is thick and very hard to wipe off just like paste wax. I’m going to stick with liquid wax that takes 1/5 the effort and time. It is so thick it won’t come out of the bottle through the nozzle cap. I have to take the cap off to get the stuff out of the bottle and that is after shaking the bottle. It’s possible that it’s better than liquid wax but I can’t tell the difference and the extra effort is just too much.
customer_reviews.author: Randy in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but our delivery was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived spoiled. Thick as molasses. Could not use. Amazon gladly refunded purchase. This is a great product. I use it regularly. but our order did not meet the usual high standards for this product. Perhaps due to heat exposure shipping to Las Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: arnie

customer_reviews.title: Gold class vs butter wet wax
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of the meguiars gold class wax buy this to try something different and to be honest the difference between these two magnificent waxes is that the meguiars is applied and removed easier also lasts a little longer but not much maybe a week On the other hand, the chemical guys butter wet wax leaves an unparalleled finish far exceeded by a display shine and a rich aroma that never hurts. if you are looking for a wax to take your car to an exhibition this is your wax
customer_reviews.author: Rafael. Jose. C. E.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a no nonsense true easy on/easy off wax. I have waxed a supercrew F150, Ford explorer and Tesla model 3 with just under half a bottle left. I apply using a porter cable da polisher and using a black hex logic pad on speed setting 2 - I feel like this is the best way to get even coverage and not waste product! The results are incredible, mirror finishes with the least effort exerted. Longevity wise, I dont know what the other reviewers are doing wrong but I get atleast 1 month of water beading + per coating. Cant complain honestly, this is now my favorite wax. ( also will "fill in" micro swirls/scratches)
customer_reviews.author: Asj826

customer_reviews.title: Returned product
customer_reviews.text: The wax was thick like a gel/paste not a like a liquid, like it had started to dry out. It did not take off the over spray and surface is still rough to the touch. I really like other Chemical Guys products but the Butter Wet Wax did not make my cut. I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Living Large

customer_reviews.title: Shine seems to last long
customer_reviews.text: I applied this about 6 weeks ago and have washed my vehicle several times due to dust or rain. After several washes, the shine is still there. When I first put it on, the water beaded but almost 6 weeks later, not so much. My car does sit out in the sun and I am hoping that the protection is still there. This product does smell good and is easy to apply. I used an orbital buffer which made the work even easier. I applied mine to plastic trims and windows and removal was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Mu

customer_reviews.title: Such a deep shine that even my Mother-In-Law noticed
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax. It goes on easy, comes off easy, and leaves a deep, beautiful shine. I have applied by hand and D/A polisher and either way gives you a great looking result. Being a carnuba-based wax, it's not going to last as long as a synthetic wax. You can either have a long-lasting wax that looks ok, or a short-lasting wax that looks great. This is the wax that looks great. I keep my car garaged when I'm not using it and get 2-3 months out of each application but if the car is left outside I'd guess you would need to reapply once a month.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product, is very creamy and easy to apply. Removes easily to very nice shine with not a ton of effort. Does have a little of the wet look as promised ...but so do most products that contain polymers. Smells really nice.... a decent all around product for ease of use, shine and price. Can't say how long it lasts because my vehicles are always getting in between spray wax update coats.
customer_reviews.author: carm

customer_reviews.title: Highly Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Chemical Guys products. I was able to bring "Big Red" back to her glossy red vs looking like a shade of depressing red. I used medium clay w the lubricator, the used DA Orbital to seal it but unfortunately with another manufacturers sealer because i couldnt get the V6, polished with Wet Mirror and then waxed with the Butter wax. I will NEVER use any other products. I absolutely will buy again and have already recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Goes on and off easily it did not last a week. No protection after 5 days 2 days rain. Not impressed. Was shipped fast by Amazon and have no problem with that or the price. Just not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Karman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! We accidentally bought two and I’m so glad we did. We used it on our charger that my husband is obsessed with and it turned out so good. Like glass and even felt super smooth after. We then used it on my car that has tons of scratches and sings and it even made my car look good. Super easy to apply and remove and even smells good! Would 100% recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DeVincentz

customer_reviews.title: Came opened
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax but when it comes opened and crusted. Mmm i don't like it. Could have contaminates. Very disappointing. This was not sold by chemical guys. Shady and not right. Something is off. Fix it and i will remove this
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best part about this wax is can be used right ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to wash and wax my truck with this product. washed with chemical guys citrus gloss and then used butter wet wax. Best part about this wax is can be used right after washing. no drying necessary and man my truck looks restored. I have used other wax & dry as u wax products b4 but this by far tops them all. gives it the shiny wet glossy look to make the paint shine. and its a great price. Definitly recommend over any other product out there!!
customer_reviews.author: good stuff

customer_reviews.title: Gloss 5-Star. Durability 2-Star.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this wax is, as the label states, a Carnauba wax, and as such provides an excellent gloss but not so much durability. If you wax frequently and keep your car indoors and treated to frequent cleaning, it’s great. If your car is a daily driver, kept outdoors, and washed maybe monthly, choose a polymer wax. Nothing wrong with Chemical Guys products, just pick the right one for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo

customer_reviews.title: Red stain .. white paint
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken a picture before I applied... I was told to buy this product by a family member that is in auto body. My new 2019 vehicle was stained by weight lifting gloves ... A huge RED STAIN on my pearl WHITE car... the stain was not coming off no matter what we tried.. this was the last thing we were going to try before bringing the car into the dealership to get the stain out.. The red stain on the paint came out and my car is super shiny! This product is God sent
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This wax smells nice but that’s the only up side. This wax only lasts 3 weeks... so unless you want to keep waxing your car every month.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy but not as glossy as others
customer_reviews.text: I really like the products this brand produces. This wax is nice and much easier to apply & buff that your regular carnuba. I'm satisfied with it but I only gave it 3 stars because compared to other top quality carnuba waxes, the shimmer & shine it produces is not nearly as brilliant and eye-catching. What I do is use it in between major detailing sessions, every week or so after a wash and do a major detail with top quality carnuba once a month on my vintage car. I still get at least 3 compliments a day when I cruise in my classic show resto VW Beetle so I'm moderately happy & will likely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RugbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Butter wax
customer_reviews.text: Not good for removing tree sap...I watched a video on utube by chemical guys . They said removes tree sap easy and look easy on video..I tryed didn t work very well! I found isopho alcohol worked way better after I scrubbed with alcohol than I used butter wax to clean up little more get a shine on truck...But bought it to remove tree sap and it sucked at that!!! video was phony
customer_reviews.author: jedma

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff Like Always With CG
customer_reviews.text: As I said in the past; I love all CG and with this wax I think I hit another gem. It works real great and is awesome because of its hydrophobic properties. This wax can be used on a wet surface and performs really well. I would recommend this to any weekend detailer to pro. It delivers a real deep wet shine and the protection lasts. Used after a glaze and seal this is the real cherry on top and will lock in all that protection for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great wax, gives a really smooth finish with exceptional shine.
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews have stated, this works like a charm. Goes on easy and buffs off easy as well. I like it because it is yellow and stands out from my white paint, unlike some other waxes that are white. This makes it easier for me to figure out which areas I’ve covered and haven’t. One thing that other reviews don’t mention that I think I should: butter wet wax smells absolutely AMAZING. This is definitely a plus as it takes me upwards of an hour and a half to do one wax job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chao

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s pretty good. I wouldn’t recommend it for a red car. I put it on my car about two weeks ago. Yesterday was rainy. When I got it home, I parked it in the garage and when I looked at it, it seems that the water dried in a yellow powder or yellow dust. I had to wipe it off which just made more dust. My car is ruby red and showed the yellow dust very well. However, the initial shine, without the rain, is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara G

customer_reviews.title: What's with the Cap
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is outstanding to use, This rating is for mostly for the 64oz container. The 64oz plastic container is a pain in the a$$. Sure, $40 for 64oz vs $18 for 16oz is a very good deal, but trying to refill a 16oz bottle is a pain. It took me 30 minutes with a funnel shaking two 16oz bottles vigorously. Rather than a regular cap on the 64oz bottle, why didn't they put a dispenser cap on it, just like the 16oz bottles?
customer_reviews.author: 2007ShelbyGT500

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: This wax is affordable and works well enough. I would highly recommend another wax (Liquid Lustre) over this one, if you are very analytical of how your car looks, and how easy to apply and remove it is. This wax performs adequately. It leaves a good shine. It's not the best to apply. It's not very buttery. You have to apply the thinnest of thin coats because the wax also isn't easy to buff off by hand. I'd recommend it at the price. But there is other better waxes out there. Picture is of my Subaru WRX STI's hood.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to apply. Just rub on with an applicator pad (I used chemical guys microfiber applicators), then wipe clean with a microfiber rag (chemical guys edgeless purple towels). Cannot speak for longevity as it’s only been on for a couple weeks, but the paint surface is smooth like new again and water beads and runs off easily. I definitely recommend clay barring the vehicle before applying to clean the paint and remove stubborn debris and pollution. This seems to have magnified the smooth finish result.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Does not last at all.
customer_reviews.text: Shine looks good, but the wax just does not last. Would suggest using another brand, (Mothers, Meguiars,) as this simply did not last on my car. 2nd rain and it was gone. no more beading. Applied with the Chemical Guys Buf_209 detail kit, using the Torx polisher, which worked great, but the wax did not work well. Was hoping for a lot more life out of it.
customer_reviews.author: greatbigred

customer_reviews.title: Buy it It! It Really Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had black bumper pain that got sprayed on our white van. Bought white spray paint thinking I would spray over the black overspend. Ghen saw this demo on YouTube. It worked! All black paint removed from white van. It isn't easy. It will take some scrubbing with product on towel .. but it worked for me. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply, gets great results, and smells good. I’ve waxed my truck 6 times and have almost used half the bottle (over the last 2 years). Once applied, I can skip wet washes for a couple weeks, just use a microfiber towel with quick detailer and it’s great. Recently started waxing over hydro slick and finishing with V07 on top
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Love that banana sent....and oooh that shine!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wax!! It goes on easily and comes off even easier! The smell is strong...but smells good if you like the fragrance of fake bananas! I clay barred my car and out the wax on...and my paint looks amazingly wet....like it was just painted. I got a few drops of water on it while driving and the water beaded up and ran off of the car almost instantly. It’s probably some of the best wax I’ve used...and I’ve tried several brands over the years. Im not a believer in the ceramic coating scheme. A good wax like this is all you need...and you don’t have to pay a small fortune to have it applied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a Clear Coat that looks like Glass
customer_reviews.text: Hugely impressed with this product. Can't say enough about it - glad I found it. + Easy on and off + Even remedied some paint damage caused by an over zealous body shop + Good value for money given size of package. + Car still looks clean after being out in the rain. Came shrink wrapped to ensure proper shipping. I am a car paint fanatic and can't believe how good this product is - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I used to use meguiars but one day decided to try chemical guys. I'm so glad I did. This is the second time I used Chemical guys products on my car. It is so easy to put it on and off my car. That's one thing I love about their product. Their product helps me keep my car paint in very good condition. They are kinda pricey but I think it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wax
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wax I can tell a difference in shine when I don’t use it after a wash only con I have it only last 4-6 weeks but I can’t really complain due to the easy on and easy wipe off of the butter wax. Im comparing this wax to the typical turtle wax which is miserable to remove. With the butter wax I apply it in the sun and can easily wipe it off in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Josh Davis

customer_reviews.title: A good wax, but not the miracle the video's show
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wax and brought back that "slick and shiny" feel to the paint on my old car. The smell of the wax is powerful, my wife said it smells like fresh fried doughnuts. If you are looking for it remove spray paint or paint contaminates like you see in the Chemical Guy's videos, it didn't for me...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time use after using Blazing Bananas. So far great!
customer_reviews.text: First time use after using Blazing Bananas. So far great! I did let it stay on the vehicle for at least 30 minutes before removing unlike the video shows just to apply then whip off. I find it easier to let a wax set before trying to buff away. Used JetSeal waited until next day to use this. Vehicle looks better than when I bought it brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average, at best.
customer_reviews.text: All I did was the hood of my 2019 F-150. I watched a YouTube video by CG staff on how to apply and remove this Butter Wet Wax. I applied it properly (by hand), according to the video. I buffed it in with a microfiber towel - before the wax dried. The Gloss/Shine was average after the buffing. I thought sure the rain would bead on the hood. Result: Negatory. No water beading to tell me the Butter Wet Wax was doing its job. I expected at least average performance of this Carnuba wax, but I gotta tell yea, I was disappointed. Expected much, much more. Now I gotta find another wax.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Same as any other good wax
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on 3 different cars with different paints. No difference between this wax and Meguires. It smells real good though. Really disappointed because the advertising is grid but don't believe it, stick with a good name brand wax and you'll be better off because the shine will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: skycab

customer_reviews.title: Amzing for removing paint pen
customer_reviews.text: I been trying to figure out how to remove this paint pen marking from my doors without damaging the stock paint and came across this product and all I can say is AMAZING First try took a few applications and then i rubbed it good and let it sit for 3 min and went to town with a microfiber towl and it came right off I will use on my DA polisher to see what it does but for the purspose i bought it cor it well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It removes spray paint
customer_reviews.text: Well, I watched a review to remove spray paint from a car with ease and came across one for this product. I did not have high expectations, but I used this to polish my newish car and it removed the spray paint someone got on the car within seconds. No scrubbing, no paint removal, and the car looks great since it's really a good polish anyways. I would recommend this to anyone in my same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My husband is absolutely obsessed with washing his Charger and he only wants the best, no dish soap car wash at this house. He heard good things about this brand so we ordered it and he loves it. Every product smells so good and none of them are offensive to the nose in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vargo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I tried this stuff out on the gas tank cover- what a difference! I thought the car was shiny, but no. The gas tank proved the rest of the car was matte. A dark colored car + this wax is an absolute winner. Should have gotten this stuff sooner. Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: MPickles

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: If, you want you vehicle to shine like the day you purchase it. I highly recommend this product. It’s very easy to apply and remove. I left it on my vehicle for about 30 -45 minutes and with little effort to remove. This product gives a bright shine and protects your paint at the same time.... Also, aid in restoring dull and fading paint...
customer_reviews.author: terreo l hathorn

customer_reviews.title: Showroom Yes, Daily driver??
customer_reviews.text: "So slick, WAC along with my Japanese racing stickers added another 2mpg..." Believe that then you can believe their write up. After two coatings and a week of Texas sun and rainstorms, the "100% fights off this and that..." is More like 40,this Butter stuff is just a step higher from a spray and wipe wax. Smells good though.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Wax on, wax off with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: As a new car detailing enthusiast, I felt a little intimidated by waxes. This is an area you could really go wrong. After looking at my options, I settled on the Butter Wet Wax from Chemical Guys. This wax is fantastic! I applied it with a microfiber sponge and polished with a microfiber cloth. The wax is very soft and buttery. It’s easy on and easy off while leaving your car with a beautiful wet shine. The smell is pleasant and the product is easy to work with. Don’t pass this one up!
customer_reviews.author: BOO3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it and LOVE the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I used this after washing our old bmw and it smells amazing! The wax goes on very easy. Does not streak (well I applied it in the evening so less chances of streaking). Made my car look so fresh! It needed an umphh! I’d also like to point out the great customer service! The first bottle I received was damaged during transit and they ended up replacing one for me! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and easy off. The shine is fantastic and water beads perfectly. I will never use another wax again. I used this with a dual action machine to apply and a microfiber to simply wipe it off after about 10 min once it hazed. Price is fantastic and delivery was faster then amazon projected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best In Class Auto Wax
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product. All I can say is WOW. Goes on easily and holy cow, the car looks better than new. What a shine. I highly recommend this product. There are videos on YouTube that indicate this product doesn't last very long ... that does not matter to me, because I wash my cars almost daily and wax and polish them often. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MovieFan

customer_reviews.title: My top brand
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before along with a lot of other products from different companies. This works better than higher priced products that are supposed to do the same thing. I have returned to using the Butter Wet wax and will probably stay with this product from now on. Fantastic results!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great wax for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the first time recently. I did the 5-step process- wash, clay, polish (Meguiar's 205), glaze (Chem Guys Creme) and this. I applied this with the old fashioned round wax applicators and put a coat on my 2014 Tundra Double Cab (even the top) in less than 30 minutes. Wiped off / buffed in another 30 minutes. So far, so good. Very easy to apply, easy to buff off.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Patriot

customer_reviews.title: You must have at least 5 clothes to remove haze
customer_reviews.text: When compare to other products its only 3 stars. Main reason multiple micro clothes are needed. Yes will get great finish, but you will work for it. Not advise for beginners, the hazel is hard to remove from tight spaces. Whereas are products hazel clear. It does smell good.
customer_reviews.author: marcwrecker

customer_reviews.title: Did not do what the commercials promise
customer_reviews.text: Worthless!!! The commercials on Youtube show how this removes spray pain. I had some very faint spraypaint overspray on my car. It did absolutely NOTHING, except make it shiny spraypaint. Worthless for what I bought it for. I used a clay bar and it removed it easily. Requested a refund....
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This wax is a winner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best wax I've ever used. I was skeptical at first, but after using a clay bar on my truck, this wax not only made the paint look amazing, it was super easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie D

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Says
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time right today after a Liquid Glass application yesterday and the difference was very noticeable. A much deeper shine than before the application. Can't speak to durability yet but the wet shine look is definitely there. Went on easily with one side being in full sun and wiped off just as easy without too much effort. Will use this again. As an update, I did this Dodge Ram 2500 plus a 2015 Subaru Forester using only 4 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and easy off. I bought this with the B&D 6-orbital waxer and ended up waxing everything I own. Waxed our old farm truck that had been sitting by the barn for 6 years and it looks like it got a new paint job. I can't say for the longevity yet but I suspect it will last. This was recommended to me by my paint and body friend that has been in the business for 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: D. Basden

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHEMICAL GUYS PRODUCT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I've used the Chemical Guys products for the last 3 years. Not one of their products has disappointed me. The butter wet wax is easy on and easy off, and it has a deep shine. You may apply by hand or use a machine. You'll say "Now that's a beautiful thing," when you're finished.
customer_reviews.author: camel

customer_reviews.title: Useless for Tree Sap
customer_reviews.text: Some of the other comments here mention it works on Tree Sap (Including one from the manufacturer). I can confirm that if you live in a place similar to the Pacific Northwest this is pretty much useless. It just swirls around and does nothing to the sap.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar S

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Easy on and off but it doesn’t last at all. It’s just wax... I wanted to like it cause I paid so much for it. I’ll use it until it’s gone.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! 10 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Easy to take off by hand. No power tools needed. Just elbow grease (barely) and 2 microfiber cloths. One to apply, the other wipe off. Successfully applied to a black car (12 y.o. paint); red car (10 y.o.) and white car (2 y.o.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Butter wet wax
customer_reviews.text: I love Chemical guys products, I bought this to help remove sap off my car, it did remove the fresh drops, although the older dry ones were a bit harder to remove, the product overall did it's job and added a wax protectant to the car at the same time. Super good.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Higuera

customer_reviews.title: What a shine!
customer_reviews.text: Used a polishing pad on a HF DA buffer, on 3, and wowzers! what a shine! I followed the recommended process;clay, then Black Light, then Butter Wet Wax. I did not do an Isopropyl solution wipe down as the paint had not been waxed before Both were super easy to apply and remove, and I spent about 3 hours polishing and waxing getting ready for a car show.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pietsch

customer_reviews.title: and it smells great: ) I can't believe this is carnuba based ...
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way, and it smells great :) I can't believe this is carnuba based because for once, a product's advertising holds true and it goes on and comes off extremely easy. Normally my arm cramps at just the thought of removing a carnuba based wax but it was not an issue with this. On the downside, I don't think it lasts quite as long as a full fledged one, but for the time and effort saved it doesn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: scatterbrn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Not wet looking
customer_reviews.text: Goes on and comes off with ease. Cant see a visible difference vs my favorite wax. However, I cant see a visible difference vs my naked paint either, so saying it will look wet is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Best Wax I've Used Yet
customer_reviews.text: Most paste-type waxes go on easy but create a powdery residue when they come off. This stuff goes on like a regular wax but it comes off with no mess. It's more like you're buffing it in. Super shine. I used this after clay-barring my 2011 truck and it looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Piersma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shine
customer_reviews.text: Applied easy and removed pretty easy, brought a shine that was awesome, the meguiars wax I used two months previously couldn't do this good. Would recommend, I don't know how long it will last but so far 2+ weeks and still beading crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck L

customer_reviews.title: Great Shine and Protection
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on easily. I used a CG microfiber applicator. It left a really nice shine and super smooth. My car is white and this made it look even brighter. I used the EZ creme glaze first to get rid of swirls. It does a great job at repelling water as seen in the photos. Lastly, the stuff smells great like most of the CG products (this is just a plus).
customer_reviews.author: FL Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This product may work just fine but the jug the company puts the wax in is pure crap! The wax will eat through the bottom of the jug allowing wax to free flow every where. Will Chemical Guys stand behind their product absolutely NOT! But what they will do is give you free shipping on your next order, what a joke. Amazon Prime members don’t pay shipping. Chemical Guys won’t even let you leave a bad review on their product review page Purchase your detailing products from Jax Wax and get 100% customer satisfaction for the life of your product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Butter wax
customer_reviews.text: Easy application, wipe on, wait and buff off as described. it took a little longer to haze over becuase it was chilly. I wanted to get in a quick wax before it went to storage. i cant comment on the depth of shine since i was indoors or how well the water beaded when washed. i would recommend gloves or you will have yellow fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Marky D

customer_reviews.title: Wax that........
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is very easy to apply and remove, unlike a lot of other waxes. It leaves a very smooth finish and water beads on top of it. It also smells good which is a plus when you have to work with It for an hour(applying on a tahoe). I am just a weekend at home car washer so I am not a pro but would 100% recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: brian c

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy on easy off! EDIT: After using for 2 years... these are an okay product. Still easy to use "wax on wax off" but the durability is trash. If you work somewhere where you have to park your car outside under the heat, these won't last longer than a month. I wash every 2-3 weeks. I spray water to see how the wax is going, it doesn't even bead or spread how its suppose to do after waxing. 3 stars for easy application.
customer_reviews.author: Just Yan

customer_reviews.title: Had a great smell. The next day was a rain storm
customer_reviews.text: Went on with ease, lots of dust and rubbing to take off. Had a great smell. The next day was a rain storm, did not really see any real up front protection. Is this just for show cars? I did not see too much "beading". did not really do much to keep my paint clean. Can I return this? It obviously did not do what I expected it to do..... bunk5602@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: BUNK56

customer_reviews.title: this product was great. It went on very easy while comming off ...
customer_reviews.text: So..... this product was great. It went on very easy while comming off with little effort with a microfiber towel. The shine is fantastic!! It was also forgiving on the black plastic. I would still try to avoid getting it on trim but it did come off on the spots where I got some on. The only heads up is this product does turn your hands yellow after using. Next time i will wear latex gloves.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, smells yummy, leaves an awesome shine. My car is relatively new so I can't say it looks better than it has in a long time....but it looks awesome when it's detailed. I think a paste wax would provide a better protective coat, but this is more about ease, time, and convenience. I think it looks just as good as any wax job though, maybe better.
customer_reviews.author: seabeav

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys WAC_201_16 Butter Wet Wax (16 Oz)
product_meta.description: Size:16 ozChemical Guys Butter Wet Wax is an all new and improved formula that delivers an unmatched surface shine and deep wet look. Butter Wet Wax goes on easier, shines brighter and lasts longer than previous generations. This improved blend of natural Carnauba, polymers, and resins leaves your car shining as if it were just washed. Chemical Guys Butter Wet Wax enables to attain the deep gloss of a paste wax in an easy on, easy off, long lasting blend. Butter Wet Wax is now even easier to use giving that amazing shine only their ultra refined, 100 percent carnauba based wax can provide. They named this wax after its trademark characteristic; it simply melts into any paintwork like butter. Chemical Guys Butter Wet Wax is simply stunning. Professionals and enthusiasts alike all around the world choose Chemical Guys Butter Wet Wax for its easy-to-use capabilities, extremely durable protection, and show winning shine that will look astonishing on most non-textured surfaces including, painted wheels, chrome bumpers, glasswork/windshields and stainless steel exhaust tips. Chemical Guys uses their all new signature, ultra-refined, carnauba formula creating a wax that utilizes the natural cleaning powers of carnauba to gently cleanse the paint, exposing the natural beauty of your vehicle's color, while also providing a protective coating that will fight out the harsh effects of the elements. The smooth, protective layer is 100 percent natural to fight off water spots, bird droppings and road tar. The new improved formula of Butter Wet Wax is even more guarded against the suns harmful UVA and UVB rays. Your vehicle needs the best protection to fight off the harmful effects of driving.
feature_bullets: New formulation for even easier application
Deep wet look to any paintwork
Improved level of protection.Date on item is manufactured date
